website_summaries.verdict: A light and airy comforter set that's perfect for warmer climates.
pros: Available in a few different patterns
Brushed microfiber material is soft and wrinkle-resistant
Pattern and colors are as pictured
Safe for machine wash. Includes comforter and 2 pillow shams
cons: Comforter runs small, so don't expect much overhang

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much I loved this comforter! It is a super soft material, just the right amount of fill, washed well. Nice design in neutral colors that goes with everything. On top of that, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: So impressed and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this comforter. It’s so fluffy And soft! It’s lightweight and breathable enough to use alone in summer, and in the colder months I just add a grey plush blanket underneath and it keeps it so warm! And it’s so so so beautiful. I got the oyster grey with little white and yellow flowers. The grey is such a calming soft color, not dark at all, and the pattern is so harmonious. The pillowcases add to the harmony, they don’t over do the pattern. I was looking for a simple, relaxed, comfy comforter and I’m so pleased with what I got!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly soft
customer_reviews.text: This comforter was for my RV when I got it I was so surprised at how soft it was because usually when I order comforters or buy in store they are stiff this was one that was what I have always wanted and plan to order more.
customer_reviews.author: kathy brashears

customer_reviews.title: Love this comforter! Beautiful design and so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this comfortable today. I love this comforter so much that I had to submit a review! The colors and design are lovely and it is just cozy and soft! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Shosh

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I’m deducting one star because it seems to run small. I can’t size up because we have a king. Otherwise it’s nice and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: FatOrangeTabby

customer_reviews.title: Soft and snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. Its soft and squishy and not too heavy. The print is on both sides and it's very pretty. I wish it was more cotton and less polyester but for the price it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fine sheet set. You can't beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: B. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super light and fluffy but keeps you just the right temperature
customer_reviews.author: Jill Merry

customer_reviews.title: Great price and nice quality .
customer_reviews.text: I love my set it was even better in person. It’s soft and very comfortable. The pillow shams were true to size. I have the king size set, king size pillows fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Bo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The comforter was as described and I was very happy with it except that I could not remove the wrinkles that came from the packing. The seller was very prompt with their response and customer service. I would definitely buy from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dorcismyname

customer_reviews.title: Looks like picture!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's so pretty and looks great on my bed . I got yellow sheets and it really brightened up my room.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra googins

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter. It's the same pattern on both sides and it very soft and warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this blanket. Great on the size and just comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Oyster Grey Comforter. It’s perfect, it’s beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Makes going to bed super cozy to get into at night and wake up so cozy, I don't want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: caryn doyle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter; so comfy & it shipped decently fast! Beautiful color! Glad I purchased this great for the price, I paired it with yellow sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My order was missing the pillow shams but I'm loving this comforter! Beautiful design and super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Tonjita

customer_reviews.title: I really like!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is absolutely beautiful. Exactly like the picture and its super comfortable. I will probably order another one from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Luvlee

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: Bought king and it is standard king size. Wish king size had a few more inches in width. Soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cute comforter with yellow accents an this was PERFECT. Super soft and comfy. Idk what it is but it’s slightly slippery and makes my bed almost feel like a water bed. It matches my yellow and grey themed room perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter, it's so soft and keeps me warm. I was hesitant at first because of the price and some of the reviews. But after thinking about it for awhile I went for it and I am glad I did. I am going to get another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Spaargaren

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket but the quality of stitching is awful. Seams are uneven with loose threads all over.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter. It's lightweight and soft. The only downfall is the static electricity, though it could be caused by the blanket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: "workerbee1055"

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and the design is exactly how it shows in pics! Loveeee it, would def purchase from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Sharion Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile for my order but I was very happy with my purchase. Very soft and light , If you don't like anything heavy on your bed this is the product to get.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Noya

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: INLOVE with my comforter. They look better in person than in the photos. First time I slept with them, I couldn’t believe how comfy they feel. Will always buy from here
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. it looks great on my bed. its soft and warm and its not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: COZY AND LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this comforter! It is feather light but will keep you warm and cozy under it! The light gray color and lovely pattern are subtle enough to blend in with my bedspread and sheets. HAPPY AND WARM!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Oz

customer_reviews.title: I have been using the comforter for close to a month now and I feel like it was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is very comfortable and keeps me very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Wont fit a California king
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is that it was not big enough...other than that a fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cheanell

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: very well made. i’ve had it awhile now and still comfy
customer_reviews.author: myname

customer_reviews.title: Cozy warm
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received it, I washed and dried, and the comforter sprang to life! It's super cozy and warm. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good comforter for the price. The fill inside takes some time to settle and it came very wrinkled but again as it sat it became smoother but not perfect so 4 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter- exactly what I hoped for and great for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is amazing. The price is right and the quality is amazing. So soft and the perfect weight. It is better quality than some comforter I have spent $60 on. Would 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Best Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly happy with this blanket. It’s beautiful and very very soft and I love it!! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel La Vigne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, so glad I found this set!
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, this duvet cover is amazing! Extremely soft, durable and visually stunning!
customer_reviews.author: t530

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly as pictured. It is soft and warm. The size is perfect. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I like this comforter a lot. Came vacuum sealed so had to fluff myself but very beautiful on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, warm, well made , high quality comforter
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, expensive looking, high quality, soft, extremely warm. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Lovely design
customer_reviews.text: This is a warm but lightweight addition to your bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Comfiter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter. Soft. It is light weight but it does hold heat.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Elliott

customer_reviews.title: so-so
customer_reviews.text: Need to put too much time into keeping it fluffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie vandervest

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as high quality as i expected. Pattern is pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rude

customer_reviews.title: Very nice comforter for the money it cost!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is not ment for the washing machine at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great price & product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this comforter! Perfect size, light weight, comfy & good quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love my blanket and pillow case!!!! So soft and comfy!!! Great design too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bo Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is awesome! It’s light weight but warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received the comforter and loved the look. However, I read the directions for washing and drying and followed them. Delicate for washing and delicate for drying.. It washed wonderfully but imagine my surprise when I took it out of the dryer and a big area was melted. I checked the dryer to make sure I did not make a mistake and and it was set on delicate. Now I have a comforter I cannot use. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rose peters

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap and light, thin and flimsy, not warm
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a comforter with a little more heft and warmth to it. This is made for nights in the 60's F, not for autumn or winter, and it seems really cheap. Thin cover and very thin barely there batting inside. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Item Delivered was Stained!
customer_reviews.text: The item, which was delivered to my neighbor instead of my address, upon opening the box, the comforter was stained all over, on both sides! Aside than that, it is soft and comfy. I just wish that it wasn't stained. It looks like some sort of grease or oil type stain. I am going to see if I can treat the stains and wash it. If not, I would like a replacement instead of a refund because I really do love the comforter!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY KINNEY

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first wash...
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I got this set because it was what we were looking for. Only for us to wash for the first time and it ripped. Definitely not worth the price, and I definitely won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena K.

customer_reviews.title: Very wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: It comes vacuum packed so it had multiple wrinkles. I took it to the laundry mat but it still did not take wrinkles out. After a few months wrinkles are still there. This company needs to change the outer material.
customer_reviews.author: S. Libstaff

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I had to send it back immediately upon opening. The size was wrong and the fabric was wrinkled beyond hope. The look and feel were so cheap that it wasn’t worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this comforter set. There was a lot of incorrect stitching and stitching was coming undone in multiple places. The material was soft, but it seemed to be mass produced. The sizing was incorrect as well. The package was marked king but the dimentions were for a queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Be Fooled By Picture
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by the picture. The comforter comes vacuum sealed. There is absolutely no loft, flat as a pancake with creases that will not come out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Brearley

customer_reviews.title: cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are very misleading, making the comforter look super thick and fluffy. It’s not. It’s very thin and they roll it up and cram it into a small box. Very cheap in person. I know you get what you pay for but I have found way better quality for the same price at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, what you get is a nice comforter and two matching (essentially decorative) pillow shams. The size is accurate and it covers our king-size bed well. We use it more as a "bedspread" than a comforter as, during the winter, it's a bit too light to provide much warmth. On the other hand, during the fall and spring it's more than adequate. Hey, it's not goose down, which the product description makes very clear, so don't expect a premium product at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and plush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter to match some new grey curtains, and blend with my yellow bedroom walls. It really fit the bill on both counts, and pulled my room together nicely. The comforter is very soft, and fluffed up nicely when I followed the directions that came with the packaging, as it was vacuum packed. The pillow shams fit my standard size pillows perfectly, and the comforter fits my full size bed quite amply, going nearly to the floor on the corners. It is not terribly heavy, but very fluffy, and I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: GreatComforter, Great price, & Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little scared to order this comforter after reading some of the reviews, but then I decided to take a chance and buy it. I'm so glad I did!! I bought the king size and it is so pretty to look at. No lingering wrinkles, no stains, no strings coming out. It's lightweight yet nice and warm. Very well made for the money! I love the way it looks in my bedroom, the gold colored spots on the comforter match my walls so that's a plus too. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: maine7275

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a moderately priced comforter set, and the quality and style are appropriate to that price point. The comforter is soft, comfortable, and quickly sheds all wrinkles from shipment packing if you follow the instructions (sent separately by email) and allow a few days once placed on the bed. While the pillow shams are adequate, the light weight of the fabric means that the edges don't stand up/out well. All things considered, this is a very nice comforter set.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: This (KING) comforter is soft and fits my queen size bed perfectly. Hangs just right on both sides of the bed. It is a warm comforter too. I usually put a second blanket under my comforter, but don't need it with this one! Would buy again for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASH!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item on November 2nd, they sent me an email about how to wash it, I washed it, and it ripped! Very upset. Loved it until it ripped but I can’t use it now.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the comforter set came in such a small box. When I tossed it in the dryer as instructed, it blossomed into a beautiful, soft and fluffy comforter. I mistakenly thought the shams were not included but turns out they were still in the dryer (I forgot to add a dryer sheet). Am very satisfied with the product and the follow-up of the seller when I reached out about the "missing" shams.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty however....
customer_reviews.text: Haven't washed it yet, but tossed in the dryer on air fluff as recommended. Still pretty flat looking and not much filling. But looks pretty and we wanted a lighter weight comforter anyway so we will be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: shad

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I got the oyster grey and so happy that I did. The color is perfect and the comforter is so lightweight. Very soft, I love to snuggle up in this. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun west

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks of use and the comforter got a hole in it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: msme

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super soft. The only problem I had was washing it because it’s so big and fluffy. There wasn’t room in the washer😂 Other than that this comforter Is great!
customer_reviews.author: J******

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this comforter in the style “Oyster Grey”. It came with two pillow cases. I have to say this is the softest and comfiest comforter I’ve ever had. It feels like the luxury comforter at the hotel. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coloring, washed beautifully & dryed on low which came out puffy & soft. Looks great on twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Smile4Me

customer_reviews.title: Light and warm
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but warm, looks attractive, actually overhangs the king bed properly - some are cut to only be the exact top dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Redque

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, a bit smaller than expected. It was more of a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit king size bed, otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this product BUT the comforter barely covers out king size bed. All round too short.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo soft!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s held up well too. It’s super soft, lightweight but keeps you warm and the pattern is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nordquest

product_meta.title: Bedsure Comforter Set King Size - Down Alternative Comforter, Microfiber Duvet Sets - 3-Piece (1 Comforter + 2 Pillow Shams), Plum Blossom Pattern, Grey
feature_bullets: AESTHETIC FLORAL PATTERN: White plum blossom, as a distinct symbol of seasonal flower, typically flourishes in late winter and early spring to infuse your space more vibrantly - Derived from Chinese art and poetry for centuries, duvet set brings values of perseverance and hope to your life - Gray Comforter Set features subtle plum blossom motifs with upright slender branches inspired by natural vitality.

PREMIUM FILLING CHOSEN: If you always toss and turn all night and couldn’t sleep a wink, our bed comforters will provide you luxurious softness with 300GSM whole piece microfiber filling yet no clumping - Worry about feather allergy? This down alternative duvet insert is NO.1 choice for you - Machine washable comforter also maintains easy care unlike down.

SUPERIOR MATERIAL SELECTION: Made with brushed microfiber, the surface presents a superior touch of softness - Boasting for unique strength and durability to ensure you long-lasting usage - Distinctive wrinkle and fade resistance properties, unlike cotton is more liable to shrink and fade - Cozy microfiber surface ensures you a heavenly sleep through the nights.

INTIMATE DETAIL DESIGN: Aesthetic stitching prevents bed comforter from shifting and clumping to keep you feeling more comfortable - Several distributing “invisible” stitches complete the bedding ensemble - Printed with picturesque motifs, this comforter can be used as a comforter alone or enhance your bedding together with duvet cover.
Available in Plum Blossom Grey Down Alternative Comforter King Down Alternative Comforters 102" x90 " with 2 pillow shams 20" x 36" .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars309 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
